snippet: An unarmed man who was shot in the chest by a New York City police officer during a confrontation in a Harlem park has been charged with assaulting an officer.
abstract: Daniel Cabrera, unarmed man who was shot by a New York City police officer during a confrontation in a Harlem park, is arrested on various charges, including assault on a police officer.
lead_paragraph: An unarmed man who was shot in the chest by a New York City police officer during a confrontation in a Harlem park has been charged with assaulting an officer.

headline.main: Unarmed Man Shot by Police Is Arrested on Various Charges
headline.print_headline: Unarmed Man Shot by Police Arrested on Various Charges
